greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of nonzero digits in the base-3 representation of n.
link: F. T. Adams-Watters, F. Ruskey, Generating Functions for the Digital Sum and Other Digit Counting Sequences, JIS 12 (2009) 09.5.6
formula: Recurrence relation: a(0) = 0, a(3m) = a(m), a(3m+1) = a(3m+2) = 1+a(m).
program: (PARI) a(n)=my(d=digits(n,3)); sum(i=1,#d,!!d[i]) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 13 2014
results.author: _Frank Ruskey_, Jun 05 2009
